name: Pixel Tower Defense (NathanWhitehead)
description:
This is my 4th game in my one week game series!

Welcome builders, monsters are coming and it's up to you to defend the castle!

In this game you control a builder, they place towers and collect gold to be returned to the castle. When over a tile to build a new tower, it will highlight green! Then just click on the tower you want to build.

Running out of gold? Well enemies drop plenty, so go collect it! Your gold sack can only hold so much, so make sure to empty it at your castle.

Like watching everything close up? Me too! So hit the Tab key to toggle a zoom in :)

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Tab to zoom in/zoom out

Click on the tower buttons on the bottom bar to build in the highlighted green tile

Press Space while inside your base to open upgrade menus

Collect gold dropped by monsters and return to your base to get gold!

If you're enjoying the game, or want more free games to play consider checking out my youtube channel here: 1 Week Games - YouTube and following my instagram page here: Nate Whitehead (@1weekgames) • Instagram photos and videos
